page.title: 07Mr.Whittle's Farm (cont.1)
page.content: He has got a potato planter and a sprayer.He had four Fiat tractors until March 1985.When he changed three of his Fiat tractors for two bigger four wheel drive tractors.He had two Cases instead of the three Fiats.The Cases are a 1485 and a 1685.He has also got a Case digger which will put a 20 ton load of sugar beet on a lorry in 15 minutes. He used to have a hundred sheep,but now he has only got 30 chickens,3 rams,1 donkey and a dog.He is altering the cattle yards so that he can have some cattle in the winter to use up the left overs of corn and other things that he cannot sell. The workers start at 8.00 am and go for dinner at 1.00 pm until 2.00 pm.They finish work at 5.00 pm.They used to start at 6.30 am so that they could groom the horses.They would be
